002.name: Ferry
002.text: Ha ha ha. thank you so much. Now i can make fresh salad.

003.name: Rega
003.text: Hey, where is the information, pal?

004.name: Ferry
004.text: Oh, sorry. Okay then....           (Trying to be serious)

005.name: Rega
005.text: C'mon, don't waste my time, i need to buy some foods. The trip makes me tired and hungry.

006.name: Ferry
006.text: Chill, Man. Remember when you said this condition of the pandemic, the government, and the city lab?

008.name: Ferry
008.text: Your insting is 75% correct, but we need more proof.

010.name: Ferry
010.text: Yes, like i said, but it just 75% possibility that you are correct.

011.name: Rega
011.text: This is crazy then ever, man. We need to investigate it.

012.name: Ferry
012.text: That's not a problem, but we need to play it cool, understand? I'll give you a call when I've more information.

013.name: Rega
013.text: Okay then, i want to go to buy some food, see you later.
